name: Freq Scan: 3000/4500 Series (ePMP)
description: Frequency scan for ePMP 3000L, 3000, 4500, and 4600 radios.

data.stepschange:
1. Login to the AP at {{ipAddress}}
2. Navigate to Tools -> Spectrum Analyzer
3. Enable Spectrum Analyzer
4. Run the scan to identify cleaner spectrum
5. Config -> Radio
6. Set new frequency based on scan results
7. Save and Reboot
8. Ensure Spectrum Analyzer is disabled if required
data.stepsverify: Verify customers reconnect and modulation/throughput improves.
data.stepsrevert:
1. Login to the AP
2. Config -> Radio
3. Revert to original frequency: {{currentFreq}}
4. Save and Reboot

name: Freq Scan: 1000/2000 Series (Legacy)
description: Frequency scan for ePMP 1000 and 2000 radios (Requires Java/Reboot).

data.customersimpacted: {{customers}}. Downtime required for reboot into Spectrum Mode.
data.stepschange:
1. Login to the AP at {{ipAddress}}
2. Config -> Radio -> Set to 'Spectrum Analyzer' mode
3. Save and Reboot
4. (Ensure IP is in Java Whitelist)
5. Connect with Cambium Spectrum Analyzer software
6. Run scan and analyze
7. Login to AP -> Config -> Radio
8. Set back to 'AP' mode
9. Set new frequency based on results
10. Save and Reboot
data.stepsverify: Verify customers reconnect and modulation/throughput improves.
data.stepsrevert:
1. Login to the AP
2. Config -> Radio
3. Revert to original frequency: {{currentFreq}}
4. Save and Reboot
data.resources: PC with Java, Cambium Spectrum Analyzer

data.customersimpacted: {{customers}}. Downtime required for reboot into Spectrum Mode.
data.stepschange:
1. Login to the AP at {{ipAddress}}
2. Tools -> Spectrum Analyzer -> Set timer to 120 seconods
3. Save
4. Run timed spectrum analysis.
6. Config
7. Config -> Radio
8. Set new frequency based on results.
9. Save and Reboot.
data.stepsverify: Verify customers reconnect and modulation/throughput improves.
data.stepsrevert:
1. Login to the AP
2. Config -> Radio
3. Revert to original frequency: {{currentFreq}}
4. Save and Reboot

2. Tools -> Site Survey
3. Run
4. Wireless -> Set new frequency based on results.
5. Save.
